Lithographer: Lithography by Knapp & Company (American, New York)
Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Trade cards from the "Terrors of America" series (N88), issued in 1889 to promote Duke's Mixture Smoking Tobacco produced by W. Duke Sons & Co. N-series cards advertising Duke's Mixture are slightly larger than those advertising Duke's Cigarettes and are extremely rare.
